entity.name: obs
entity.query: SELECT o.uuid, obs_id, person_id, obs_datetime, cn.name as concept_name, value_group_id, value_boolean, value_coded, value_coded_name_id, value_drug, value_datetime, value_numeric, value_modifier, value_text, value_complex FROM openmrs.obs o inner join concept_name cn on cn.concept_id = o.concept_id WHERE person_id=${dataimporter.request.personId} AND o.voided=0 AND cn.voided=0
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT o.uuid, obs_id, person_id, obs_datetime, cn.name as concept_name, value_group_id, value_boolean, value_coded, value_coded_name_id, value_drug, value_datetime, value_numeric, value_modifier, value_text, value_complex FROM openmrs.obs o inner join concept_name cn on cn.concept_id = o.concept_id FROM openmrs.obs WHERE uuid='${dih.delta.uuid}' AND o.voided=0 AND cn.voided=0 inner join concept_name cn on cn.concept_id = o.concept_id
entity.deltaQuery: select o.uuid from openmrs.obs o inner join concept_name cn on cn.concept_id = o.concept_id where person_id='${dataimporter.request.personId}' AND o.voided=0 AND cn.voided=0 AND o.date_created > '${dataimporter.request.lastIndexTime}'
entity.deletedPkQuery: select o.uuid from openmrs.obs o inner join concept_name cn on cn.concept_id = o.concept_id where person_id='${dataimporter.request.personId}' AND (o.voided=1 OR cn.voided=1) AND o.date_voided > '${dataimporter.request.lastIndexTime}'
